'''Daniel T. Grotta''' ([[1944]]â€”[[13 December]] [[2015]]<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Douglas A. Anderson]]|articleurl=http://tolkienandfantasy.blogspot.com/2015/12/end-of-year-chatter.html|articlename=End of the Year Chatter|dated=31 December 2015|website=[http://tolkienandfantasy.blogspot.com/ tolkienandfantasy.blogspot.com]|accessed=1 January 2016}}</ref>), sometimes credited as '''Daniel Grotta-Kurska''', was a freelance american journalist. In [[1976]], Grotta published the first biography of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. He gave many speeches on Tolkien, and appeared on both radio and TV shows discussing Tolkien and his work.
